Sentencas: Acceptor doped-ceria is a possible electrolyte material for the IT-SOFC (intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell) due to its high oxygen-ion conductivity.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: However, its use has been limited by its mechanical weakness and the appearance of electronic conductivity in reducing condition.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: In this study, alumina was selected as an additive in the doped-ceria to see if it increases the oxygen-ion conductivity and mechanical strength.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: Effects of alumina addition in doped ceria were studied as a function of alumina content and acceptor (Gd) content.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of (Ce1-x Gd (x) O2-delta)(1-y) + (Al2O3) (y) (x = 0-0.35, y = 0-0.10) was measured by using impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: The grain conductivity of Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (GDC20) with 5 mol% alumina increased similar to 3 times from that of GDC20 at 300 degrees C.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: The grain conductivity was even similar to 2 times higher than that of Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-delta (GDC10) at 300 degrees C.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of GDC20 without alumina addition, measured at 500 degrees C in air, rapidly decreased after exposure to reducing condition (Po-2 similar to 10(-22) stop atm) at 800 degrees
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: C. However, the decrease was much slower in GDC20 with alumina addition, indicating the improved mechanical strength.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria

Sentencas: Among the examined compositions, (Ce0.75Gd0.25 O2-delta)(0.95) + (Al2O3)(0.05) (GDC25A5) showed the highest conductivity at most temperatures.
Titulo: The effect of alumina addition on the electrical conductivity of Gd-doped ceria
